body.name: Zip Ties black 12 Inch 45 lbs 200 Pack, Multi-Purpose Heavy Duty Self-Locking Premium Nylon Cable Ties, UV Resistant Wire Ties for Indoor and Outdoor, by AceTrix
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Higher Tensile Strength】The tensile strength of AceTrix zip tie is 45 lbs/20 kg, higher than others. AceTrix zip ties width is 0.18 inch(4.5mm), wider than standards 0.14 inch(3.6mm).
【High Quality】AceTrix zip ties heavy duty are made of UV resistant halogen free nylon 66. Operation temperature is -40℉ to 185℉ with UL94V-2 flammability.
【Self-locking Design】AceTrix zip ties can be easily locked in, tightly and securely.One-piece construction for consistent performance and reliability.
【Multi-purpose Applications】AceTrix zip ties can be used to tie cords and cables for electronics.Zip ties 12 inch can be used to organize electrical wires and PC cords.
【Warranty】AceTrix zip ties have a 1-year warranty period. Our customer will receive a 100% refund if any quality issues under warranty period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There are so many similar products on Amazon, but super happy with this product I picked. Got it for my boyfriend’s office project, and it comes very fast. The single piece is very sturdy, easy to use, and great value with the full bag. Highly recommend this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the 12-inch black zip ties with a 45 lbs tensile strength, coming in a pack of 200. I must say, the quantity provided at such an affordable price is truly impressive. They are incredibly easy to use, making them perfect for a wide range of applications, from organizing cables and securing items in the home to more demanding tasks in professional settings. The strength and durability of these ties have exceeded my expectations... Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone in need of high-quality, convenient, and cost-effective zip ties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: Good build quality, very sturdy. 200/bag is just half the price of Walmart, great bang for the buck.Very recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tie is indeed very versatile, with excellent quality, suitable for various purposes. I use it to tie up plants to prevent them from falling over, and it's equally great for bundling wires. The number of them is large, allowing for gradual use, making it a very cost-effective choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Utility with AceTrix Zip Ties!
reviews.reviewText: AceTrix Zip Ties have truly revolutionized the way I manage cables and organize various items around my home and workspace. This 200-pack of black 12-inch ties is a game-changer in terms of quality, durability, and versatility.Firstly, these zip ties are incredibly sturdy, boasting a hefty 45-pound weight capacity. I've used them for everything from securing heavy-duty outdoor equipment to tidying up cables behind my entertainment center, and they've never let me down. The self-locking mechanism ensures a tight, secure hold every time, providing peace of mind that my belongings are safely fastened.Moreover, the premium nylon construction of these ties makes them highly resilient to both indoor and outdoor conditions. Whether braving the scorching sun or enduring chilly temperatures, these UV-resistant ties maintain their integrity, ensuring long-lasting performance in any environment.One of the aspects I appreciate most about AceTrix Zip Ties is their versatility. From organizing electrical wires to bundling garden tools, there's virtually no limit to their applications. Plus, the sleek black color adds a professional touch to any project, maintaining a clean and organized appearance.In summary, AceTrix Zip Ties have become an indispensable tool in my household and workplace. Their exceptional quality, durability, and versatility make them a must-have for anyone seeking reliable cable management solutions. I highly recommend these zip ties to anyone in need of premium-quality fastening solutions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tied the cables to my bike frame. It works even after freezing days I rode on the bumpy road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More Flexible Than Many Ties, Easier To Work With, Strong and Tight
reviews.reviewText: These ties are about 12 inches in length and are thick and strong. They seem to be made of a slightly softer nylon that makes them much easier to bend and work with than others. They do not stretch however so there’s no tradeoff. They ratchet down tightly and held some heavy steel rods firmly. The step locks are deep enough that there is no slip back or bending in the binding no matter how hard I pulled. The extra length trims easily. At a rating or 45 lbs they will well serve the majority of jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really good zip ties. They are plenty strong and I have not had once break yet. They are easy to use, the locking mechanism works perfectly, and they are great for all my zip tying needs.
